About_TGIS.Title: About TGIS
About_TGIS.Paragraph:
Welcome to Throne of Grace School, the centre for academic excellence, and a breeder of future leaders.
Throne of Grace School is a mission school, established by the grace of God in September, 2012 under the leadership of the Holy Spirit. The school started with five staff and six pupils. Since then, the school has experienced growth in overall academic performance, staff and pupils population.
The number of teaching staff has risen to thirty-six and non-teaching staff to eleven. The school now has about seventy - two pupils in her secondary school and about one hundred and seventy-two in Nursery/Primary School.
Our pupils are exposed to International conferences. They are also encouraged to go on excursions to important places.
In March 2015, the school joined the list of approved schools by Ministry of Education of Oyo State Government.

Meet_the_Director.Title: Meet the Director
Meet_the_Director.Paragraph:
Pastor Moses O MORAWO hails from Ibadan.He holds a degree of Master of Business Administration (MBA) from University of Ibadan (1990). He was a former teacher at Liberty Academy and Ibadan City Academy, all in Ibadan. He later became Executive Director at University Press PLC, one of the leading publishing companies in Nigeria where he worked for 12 years and retired in the year 2013. He is the author of Schools' Morning Devotion Made Simple with Leadership Principles.
Pastor Moses O MORAWO is a seasoned administrator with high level of entrepreneurial ability and sound leadership quality. He is currently the Chief Executive and Director of Throne of Grace Schools. He is happily married to Deborah MORAWO and blessed with God fearing children.
